entry.title: Day 1
entry.content: #你到底什么时候能转行成功？ ##26.Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array 1234567891011121314151617class Solution { public int removeDuplicates(int[] nums) { if(nums.length == 0){ return 0; } int end = 0; for (int i = 1; i < nums.length; i++){ if (nums[end] != nums[i]){ end ++; nums[end] = nums[i]; } } return end+1; }} ##27. Remove Element 1234567891011121314151617class Solution { public int removeElement(int[] nums, int val) { if(nums.length == 0){ return 0; } int end = 0; //还可以假想一个-1位element，这样end=-1，下面先end++再赋值 for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++){ if(nums[i] != val){ nums[end] = nums[i]; end++; } } return end; }}

entry.title: 买房策略
entry.content: 9/14/2018:当下的策略很简单，希望以后可以越来越完善。 * list price > budget - hot home: don't need to have a tour - not hot home: wait * list price < budget - hot home: hurry - not hot home: lowball

entry.title: My first post
entry.content: 最近在看创世纪，很是喜欢文彪，以他的名字创建个blog，记录一下我自己的生活。
